title: Add a new method.
name: AddMethod
description:
Add a new method definition from a specific language. You can get an specific language by request /methods/lang/:lang
Currently only en_US and es_CR are available.

examples.title: Example query:
examples.content:
POST /methods/lang/es_CR HTTP/1.1
Add a new method entry in Costarrican Spanish.
Redirects to methods /methods/lang/en_US if /methods

Parameter.description: Flag to check if the form has labels.
Text with spots to build de UVP.
The form field identifier used into the template.

examples.title: Example:

Success 200.description: Flag to check if the form has labels.
Text with spots to build de UVP.
The form field identifier used into the template.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Retrieve a method.
name: GetMethod
description:
Retrieve a method from a specific language. You can get an specific language by request /methods/lang/:lang/:slug
Currently only en_US and es_CR are available.

examples.title: Example query:
examples.content:
GET /methods/lang/es_CR/GeoffMoores HTTP/1.1
Retrieve all the methods in Costarrican Spanish.
Redirects to methods /methods/lang/en_US/GeoffMoores if /methods/GeoffMoores

examples.title: Example fields:
examples.content:
GET /methods/lang/es_CR/GeoffMoores?fields=name+has_labels+template HTTP/1.1
Get Methods with only name, has_labels, template and slug (default) fields.

Success 200.description: Flag to check if the form has labels.
Text with spots to build de UVP.
The form field identifier used into the template.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Retrieve a list of methods.
name: GetMethods
description:
Retrieve a list of methods from a specific language. You can get an specific language by request /methods/lang/:lang
Currently only en_US and es_CR are available.

examples.title: Example query:
examples.content:
GET /methods/lang/es_CR HTTP/1.1
Retrieve all the methods in Costarrican Spanish.
Redirects to methods /methods/lang/en_US if /methods

examples.title: Example fields:
examples.content:
GET /methods/lang/es_CR?fields=name+has_labels+template HTTP/1.1
Get Methods with only name, has_labels, template and slug (default) fields.

Success 200.description: Flag to check if the form has labels.
Text with spots to build de UVP.
The form field identifier used into the template.
